rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and view of the garden.
rooms.vastu: East facing to enhance energy flow.

rooms.description: Modern dining space integrated with living area.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and private balcony.

irregular_plot_handling.description: Design incorporates flexible spaces such as an extended living room and open-plan kitchen-dining area to accommodate the irregular plot shape.
